sql-statement.sql:
from sys_log where 1=1 <% if(domain_id == "root"){ %>
<% } else if(!isEmpty(domain_id)){%> and domain_id=#'$domain_id$'# <% } %>
<% if(!isEmpty(user_uuid)){ %> and upper(user_name) like upper(#'%$user_uuid$%'#) <% } %>
<% if(!isEmpty(op_type)){ %> and upper(op_type) like upper(#'%$op_type$%'#) <% } %>
<% if(!isEmpty(startdate_start)){ %> and op_date >= to_timestamp(#'$startdate_start$'#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:ss') <% } %>
<% if(!isEmpty(startdate_end)){ %> and op_date <= to_timestamp(#'$startdate_end$'#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:ss') <% } %>
